titleStmt.title: A full answer paragraph by paragraph, to Sir John Fenwick's paper given to the sheriffs, January the 28th, 1696/7 at the place of execution on Tower-Hill by a true son of the Church of England, as establish'd by law.
titleStmt.author: True son of the Church of England.
Fenwick, John, Sir, 1645?-1697.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
